anya-e0803n14:5: Tasmā tāva bhūdhātuto pavattassa bhūtasaddassa atthuddhāro nīyate –
anya-e0803n14:11_1: dissati. ‘‘Bhūtamidanti bhikkhave samanupassathā’’tiādīsu hi ayaṁ pañcakkhandhesu
anya-e0803n14:11_2: dissati. ‘‘Yānīdha bhūtāni samāgatānī’’ti ettha amanusse. ‘‘Cattāro kho bhikkhu mahābhūtā
anya-e0803n14:11_3: hetū’’ti ettha dhātūsu. ‘‘Bhūtasmiṁ pācittiya’’ntiādīsu vijjamāne. ‘‘Yo ca kālaghaso
anya-e0803n14:11_4: bhūto’’ti ettha khīṇāsave. ‘‘Sabbeva nikkhipissanti, bhūtā loke samussaya’’nti ettha
anya-e0803n14:11_6: vacanaṁ idaṁ. Ṭīkāyamādisaddena uppādādīni gayhare. Vuttañhetaṁ – ‘‘jātaṁ bhūtaṁ
anya-e0803n14:11_7: saṅkhata’’ntiādīsu bhūtasaddo uppāde dissati. Saupasaggo pana ‘‘pabhūtamariyo pakaroti
anya-e0803n14:11_9: sāṇavāsī’’tiādīsu paññattiyaṁ. ‘‘Abhibhūto māro vijito saṅgāmo’’tiādīsu vidhamane.
anya-e0803n14:11_11: vediyane. ‘‘Vibhūtaṁ paññāyā’’tiādīsu pākaṭīkaraṇe dissati, te sabbe ‘‘rukkhādīsū’’tiādisaddena
anya-e0803n14:13_0: Bhavituṁ, ubbhavituṁ, samubbhavituṁ, pabhavituṁ, parābhavituṁ, atibhavituṁ, sambhavituṁ,
anya-e0803n14:13_1: vibhavituṁ, bhotuṁ, sambhotuṁ, vibhotuṁ, pātubhavituṁ, pātubbhavituṁ vā, pātubhotuṁ.
anya-e0803n14:14_0: Paribhotuṁ paribhavituṁ, abhibhotuṁ abhibhavituṁ, adhibhotuṁ adhibhavituṁ, atibhotuṁ
anya-e0803n14:14_1: atibhavituṁ, anubhotuṁ anubhavituṁ, samanubhotuṁ samanubhavituṁ, abhisambhotuṁ abhisambhavituṁ.
anya-e0803n14:14_2: Imāni sakammakāni tumantapadāni, sabbānetāni suddhakattari bhavanti.
anya-e0803n14:15: ‘‘Bhāvetuṁ, pabhāvetuṁ, sambhāvetuṁ, vibhāvetuṁ, paribhāvetuṁ’’iccevamādīni hetukattari tumantapadāni, sabbānipi hetukattari tumantapadāni sakammakāniyeva bhavanti. Uddesoyaṁ.
anya-e0803n14:16_0: Tatra samānatthapadesu ekamevādipadaṁ gahetvā niddeso kātabbo – bhavitunti hotuṁ
anya-e0803n14:16_1: vijjituṁ paññāyituṁ sarūpaṁ labhituṁ. Ettha vuttanayānusārena sesānampi tumantānaṁ
anya-e0803n14:16_2: niddeso vitthāretabbo, sabbāni tumantapadāni catutthiyatthe vattanti ‘‘tvaṁ mama
anya-e0803n14:16_3: cittamaññāya, nettaṁ yācitumāgato’’ti ettha viya. Yācitunti hi yācanatthāyāti attho.
anya-e0803n14:16_5: vā ādinā attho gahetabbo. Apica ‘‘nekkhammaṁ daṭṭhu khemato’’ti ettha ‘‘daṭṭhu’’nti
anya-e0803n14:16_7: gahetabbāni. Etāni ca nipātapadesu saṅgahaṁgacchanti. Vuttañhi niruttipiṭake nipātapadaparicchede
anya-e0803n14:16_8: ‘‘tuṁ iti catutthiyā’’ti. Tatrāyamattho ‘‘tuṁ iti etadanto nipāto catutthiyā atthe vattatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n14:19_0: Bhavitvā, bhavitvāna, bhavituna, bhaviya, bhaviyāna. Ubbhavitvā, ubbhavitvāna, ubbhavituna,
anya-e0803n14:19_1: ubbhaviya, ubbhaviyāna. Esa nayo ‘‘samubbhavitvā, parābhavitvā, sambhavitvā, vibhavitvā,
anya-e0803n14:19_2: pātubbhavitvā’’ti etthāpi. Imāni akammakāni ussukkanatthāni tvādiyantapadāni.
anya-e0803n14:20_0: Bhutvā, bhutvāna, paribhavitvā, paribhavitvāna, paribhavituna, paribhaviya, paribhaviyāna,
anya-e0803n14:20_1: paribhuyya. Abhibhavitvā, abhibhavitvāna, abhibhavituna, abhibhaviya, abhibhaviyāna,
anya-e0803n14:20_2: abhibhuyya. Esa nayo ‘‘adhibhavitvā, atibhavitvā, anubhavitvā’’ti etthāpi. Idañcettha
anya-e0803n14:20_3: nidassanaṁ. ‘‘Tamavoca rājā anubhaviyāna tampi, eyyāsi khippaṁ ahamapi pūjaṁ kassa’’nti.
anya-e0803n14:23: Idamettha pāḷinidassanaṁ, imāni sakammakāni ussukkanatthāni tvādiyantapadāni. Imāni cattāri suddhakattariyeva bhavanti.
anya-e0803n14:24_0: ‘‘Bhāvetvā, bhāvetvāna. Pabhāvetvā, pabhāvetvāna. Sambhāvetvā, sambhāvetvāna. Vibhāvetvā,
anya-e0803n14:25_0: Tatra samānatthapadesu ekamevādipadaṁ gahetvā niddeso kātabbo – bhavitvāti hutvā
anya-e0803n14:25_1: paññāyitvā sarūpaṁ labhitvā. Evaṁ vuttanayānusārena sesānampi tvādiyantapadānaṁ niddeso
anya-e0803n14:25_2: vitthāretabbo. Ayaṁ pana viseso bhutvāti sampattiṁ anubhutvāti sakammakavasena attho
anya-e0803n14:25_3: gahetabbo. Bhutvā anubhutvāti imesañhi samānatthataṁ saddhammavidū icchanti. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n14:27: Atthaṁ sūcenti ‘‘hutvā’’ti, padassa pana neva te.
anya-e0803n14:36_0: Evaṁ ussukkanatthe pavattāni tvādiyantapadānipi niddiṭṭhāni, sabbānetāni avibhattikānīti
anya-e0803n14:36_1: gahetabbāni. Niruttipiṭake hi nipātaparicchede avibhattikāni katvā tvādiyantapadāni
anya-e0803n14:36_2: vuttāni. Saddatthavidūnaṁ pana mate paṭhamādivibhattivasena savibhattikāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n14:37_0: Imasmiñca pana tvādiyantādhikāre idañcupalakkhitabbaṁ – bhutvā gacchati, bhutvā gato,
anya-e0803n14:37_1: bhutvā gamissasi, kasitvā vapati. Umaṅgā nikkhamitvāna, vedeho nāvamāruhi. Bhutvāna
anya-e0803n14:37_2: bhikkhu bhikkhassu iccādī samānakattukānaṁ dhātūnaṁ pubbakāle tvādisaddappayogā.
anya-e0803n14:37_3: ‘‘Bhutvā gacchatī’’ti ettha hi ‘‘bhutvā’’ti idaṁ pubbakālakriyādīpakaṁ padaṁ. ‘‘Gacchatī’’ti
anya-e0803n14:37_4: idaṁ pana uttarakālakriyādīpakaṁ, samānakattukāni cetāni padāni ekakattukānaṁ kriyānaṁ
anya-e0803n14:37_5: vācakattā. Tathā hettha yo gamanakriyāya kattā, so eva bhuñjanakriyāya kattubhūto
anya-e0803n14:37_6: daṭṭhabbo. Ayaṁ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n14:40_0: Iccādīnipi pana samānakattukānaṁ samānakāle tvādisaddappayogā. Ettha hi ‘‘nihantvānā’’ti
anya-e0803n14:40_1: padaṁ samānakālakriyādīpakaṁ padaṁ. ‘‘Udito’’ti idaṁ pana uttarakālakriyādīpakaṁ
anya-e0803n14:40_2: padanti na vattabbaṁ samānakālakriyāya idhādhippetattā. Tasmāyeva samānakālakriyādīpakaṁ
anya-e0803n14:40_3: padanti gahetabbaṁ. Ayaṁ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo.
anya-e0803n14:41_0: Keci pana ‘‘mukhaṁ byādāya sayati, akkhiṁ parivattetvā passatī’’ti udāharanti. Apare
anya-e0803n14:41_1: ‘‘nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī’’ti. Tattha byādānaparivattanuttarakālo byādānūpasamalakkhaṇaṁ
anya-e0803n14:41_2: passanakriyāya lakkhiyati. ‘‘Nisajja adhīte, ṭhatvā kathetī’’ti ca samānakālatāyapi
anya-e0803n14:41_3: ajjhenakathanehi pubbepi nisajjaṭṭhānāni hontīti sakkā pubbuttarakālatā sambhāvetuṁ,
anya-e0803n14:41_4: tasmā purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttāni. Udayasamakālameva hi tannivattanīyanivattananti.
anya-e0803n14:42_1: panettha pavisanakriyā purimā, āvaraṇakriyā pana pacchimā, tasmā ‘‘āvaritvā’’ti idaṁ
anya-e0803n14:42_2: aparakālakriyādīpakaṁ padanti veditabbaṁ. ‘‘Pavisatī’’ti idaṁ pana pubbakālakriyādīpakaṁ
anya-e0803n14:42_3: padanti. Ayaṁ nayo aññatrāpi īdisesu ṭhānesu netabbo. Apare ‘‘dha’nti kacca patito
anya-e0803n14:42_4: daṇḍo’’ti udāharaṇanti. Abhighātabhūtasamāyoge pana abhighātajasaddassa samānakālatā
anya-e0803n14:42_5: ettha labbhatīti idhāpi purimāniyeva udāharaṇāni yuttānīti.
anya-e0803n14:43_0: ‘‘Pisācaṁ disvā cassa bhayaṁ hoti. Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā’’iccādi asamāne
anya-e0803n14:43_1: kattari payogo. Ettha hi pisācaṁ disvā purisassa bhayaṁ hoti, paññāya disvā assa
anya-e0803n14:43_2: puggalassa āsavā parikkhīṇā. Evaṁ samānakattukatā dhātūnaṁ na labbhati dassanakriyāya
anya-e0803n14:43_3: purisesu pavattanato, bhavanādikriyāya ca bhayādīsu pavattanatoti daṭṭhabbaṁ. Ayaṁ
anya-e0803n14:44_0: Idampi panettha upalakkhitabbaṁ ‘‘appatvā nadiṁ pabbato, atikkamma pabbataṁ nadī’’iccādi
anya-e0803n14:44_1: parāparayogo. ‘‘Sīhaṁ disvā bhayaṁ hoti, ghataṁ pivitvā balaṁ jāyate, ‘dha’nti katvā
anya-e0803n14:44_2: daṇḍo patito’’iccādi lakkhaṇahetuādippayogo. ‘‘Nhatvā gamanaṁ, bhutvā sayanaṁ. Upādāya
anya-e0803n14:45_0: Iccevaṁ sabbathāpi samānakattukānaṁ dhātūnaṁ pubbakāle tvādisaddappayogo, samānakattukānaṁ
anya-e0803n14:45_1: samānakāle tvādisaddappayogo, samānakattukānaṁ aparakāle tvādisaddappayogo, asamānakattukānaṁ
anya-e0803n14:46_0: Yadi evaṁ kasmā kaccāyane ‘‘pubbakālekakattukānaṁ tuna tvāna tvā vā’’ti pubbakāleyeva
anya-e0803n14:46_1: ekakattukaggahaṇaṁ katanti? Yetuyyena tvādiyantānaṁ padānaṁ purimakālakriyādīpanato.
anya-e0803n14:46_2: Kaccāyane hi yebhuyyena pavattiṁ sandhāya ‘‘pubbakālekakattukāna’’nti vuttaṁ. Yasmā
anya-e0803n14:46_3: pana ‘‘iti katvā’’tiādīnaṁ padānaṁ hetuatthavasenapi pubbācariyehi attho saṁvaṇṇito,
anya-e0803n14:46_5: yathāpayogaṁ ‘‘bhavanahetu pacanahetū’’tiādinā hetuatthopi gahetabbo. Atridaṁ vuccati –
anya-e0803n14:51: ‘‘Gacchāmi dāni nibbānaṁ, yattha gantvā na socati’’;
anya-e0803n14:55: Evaṁ bhūtasaddassa atthuddhāro ca tumantapadañca tvādiyantapadañcāti atthattikaṁ vibhattaṁ.
anya-e0803n14:60: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
